content.body: https://www.pythonpool.com/tokenize-string-in-python/#Method_5_Tokenize_String_In_Python_Using_Gensim Gensim is a library in Python which is open-source and is widely used for Natural Language Processing **and Unsupervised Topic Modeling.**
